Name: Store_SummonItem_SummonDescription_Grade
Text_Korean: 已確認至少 1 個<span color="#7eff00">★{0}</>

Name: Store_SummonItem_SelectCharacter_FullText
Text_English: Select a character to choose an item.
Text_Korean: 請選擇一個角色來使用該設備。

Name: Store_SummonItem_ConfirmQuestion
Text_Korean: 您想購買 {0} 個角色裝備嗎？

Name: Store_Confirm_Buy_Item
Text_Korean: 您想購買 <span color="#eec178">{0}</> <span color="#eec178">{1}</> 狗嗎？

Name: Store_Terms_Text
Text_English:
If 7days have passed since purchase, or the product is used or opened from the inbox, refund is unavailable.
Unauthorized purchase by a minor can be canceled.
Text_Korean:
- 此商品自購買後 7 天后，或收到或在郵箱中使用時，不可撤回。
- 未經法定代理人同意的未成年人支付的款項可以被取消。

Name: Store_MileageGuide_GuideTitle
Text_Korean: 如何賺取商店里程和查看獎勵

Name: Store_MileageGuide_Guide01
Text_English: - Mileage is incurred when a player purchase gems or items from the store.
Text_Korean: - 當您在商店使用珠寶或購買產品時，會累積里程。

Name: Store_MileageGuide_Guide02
Text_English: Each time you reach the Bronze, Silver, and Gold ranks, you can get their respective rewards.
Text_Korean: 每次達到青銅、白銀和黃金等級時，您都可以獲得各自的獎勵。

Name: Store_MileageGuide_Guide03
Text_English: - The reward content can be examined by tapping the reward box icon.
Text_Korean: - 點擊獎勵框圖標查看獎勵詳情。

Name: Store_MileageGuide_Caution01
Text_English: - Additional mileage is no longer incurred after achieving grade S.
Text_Korean: - 達到黃金級別後無需額外里程累積。

Name: Store_MileageGuide_Caution02
Text_English: - Rewards after grade S will reset the mileage.
Text_Korean: - 如果您在達到黃金級別後獲得獎勵，您的里程將被重置並重新計入。

Name: Store_BuyError
Text_English: You cannot make a purchase anymore.

Name: Store_SummonItem_TenSummonDesc
Text_English: When summoned 10 times, 1 piece of 4-star or higher equipment is confirmed
Text_Korean: 召喚10次，確認1件4星以上裝備

Name: Store_PackageName_660
Text_Korean: 戰鬥機等級升級包 I

Name: Store_PackageText5
Text_Korean: 每日體驗提升禮物（{0} 天）

Name: Store_PackageText6
Text_English: A total of {0} experience boosts + a total of {1} gems!
Text_Korean: 總共 {0} 個經驗提升 + 總共 {1} 個寶石！

Name: Store_BoostPackage_Desc400
Text_English:
Daily Gold Boost Gift (28) Days
{0} Gold Buff Tickets + Total {1} ​​Gems!
Text_Korean:
每日金幣提升禮物 (28) 天
{0} 金幣 Buff 門票 + 總共 {1} 顆寶石！

Name: Store_BoostPackage_Desc401
Text_English:
Soul sword boost gift received every day (28) days
{0} soul swords + {1} gems in total!
Text_Korean:
每天 (28) 天收到靈魂劍提升禮物
{0} 把靈魂劍 + {1} 顆寶石！

Name: Store_BoostPackage_Desc402
Text_English:
Daily EXP Boost Gift (28) Days
A total of {0} experience buff tickets + a total of {1} gems!
Text_Korean:
每日經驗提升禮物 (28) 天
總共 {0} 經驗增益票 + 總共 {1} 寶石！

Name: Store_BoostPackage_Desc403
Text_English:
Daily Adventure Boost Gift (28) Days
A total of {0} triple adventure tickets + {1} jewels in total!
Text_Korean:
每日冒險加成禮物 (28) 天
總共 {0} 三重冒險門票 + {1} 珠寶！

Name: Store_PackageTab_660
Text_Korean: 戰鬥機等級升級包 I

Name: Store_Package_LevelupDesc
Text_English: You can get a total of <span color="#eec178">{1} gems</> when purchasing {0}.
Text_Korean: 購買 {0} 時，您總共可以獲得 <span color="#eec178">{1} 顆寶石</>。

Name: Store_Package_Flatrate_Desc
Text_English: If you purchase both Weekly Daily Benefits and Monthly Daily Offers, you can instantly get 1,000 Gems. (Limited to the first time)
Text_Korean: 如果您同時購買每週每日福利和每月每日優惠，您可以立即獲得 1,000 顆寶石。 （限第一次）

Name: Store_Package_Flatrate_Summary
Text_English:
- This is a product that cannot be withdrawn after 7 days have passed since purchase, or when the product is received or used in the mailbox.
- Payments made by minors who do not have the consent of their legal representative can be cancelled.
Text_Korean:
- 此商品自購買後 7 天后，或收到或在郵箱中使用時，不可撤回。
- 未經法定代理人同意的未成年人支付的款項可以被取消。

Name: Store_Package_FlatrateItem_Day
Text_Korean: 每天收到 {0} 份福利（{1} 天）

Name: Store_Package_Monthly_Incomplete
Text_Korean: 每月每日福利購買未完成

Name: Store_Package_Monthly_Complete
Text_Korean: 每月每天完成福利購買

Name: Store_Package_Weekly_Incomplete
Text_Korean: 每週每日福利購買未完成

Name: Store_Package_Weekly_Complete
Text_Korean: 每週每日福利購買完成

Name: Store_Package_Reach_Warning
Text_English:
If you achieve {1} character level {2} within {0} days after purchase, you will receive {3} crystals!
Caution: If the mission fails, the mission reward is not paid, so please complete the mission within the period!
Text_Korean:
如果您在購買後 {0} 天內達到 {1} 個角色等級 {2}，您將收到 {3} 個水晶！
注意：如果任務失敗，不支付任務獎勵，請在規定時間內完成任務！

Name: Store_Package_NotPurchase
Text_English:
You can purchase this package product only if you are {0} {1} level
or lower.
Text_Korean:
只有 {0} {1} 級
或更低級別才能購買此套餐產品。

Name: Store_PackagePeriod_Hour
Text_Korean: 剩餘福利期：{0} 小時 {1} 分鐘

Name: Store_PackagePeriod_Second
Text_English: Remaining benefit period: less than 1 minute

Name: Store_BoostPackage_Desc5
Text_English: One ticket to summon equipment 10 times every day for 7 days!

Name: Store_BoostPackage_BonusDesc
Text_English:
All products paid for 7 days are additionally paid as a bonus when you acquire
!
Text_Korean:
當您獲得
時，所有支付 7 天的產品都會作為獎勵額外支付！

Name: Store_GuestWarning_Content
Text_English:
Currently, the account is not linked. When purchasing products with a guest account, purchase data may be lost when
game is deleted, device is changed, or mobile phone is initialized.
In order to use the service on other devices, you need to link your account.
Text_Korean:
目前，該帳戶未關聯。使用訪客賬戶購買產品時，
刪除遊戲、更換設備或初始化手機可能會丟失購買數據。
為了在其他設備上使用該服務，您需要關聯您的帳戶。

Name: Store_Package_Used_SummonItem
Text_English: ※ Bonus tickets will not be awarded if you have not logged in for more than 1 day.
Text_Korean: ※ 超過 1 天未登錄將無法獲得獎勵門票。

Name: Store_Package_WarningSummury
Text_English: - If you do not log in after purchasing the product, the product on the first day will not be paid. The product can be picked up in the mailbox.
Text_Korean: - 如果您在購買產品後沒有登錄，第一天的產品將不會付款。可以在郵箱中領取物品。

Name: Store_Package_Used_HotTimeBuff
Text_English: Buff tickets are available in the Hot Time & Buff menu.
Text_Korean: Buff 門票可在 Hot Time & Buff 菜單中找到。

Name: Store_Package_Receive_Mail
Text_English: - The product can be picked up in the mailbox.
Text_Korean: - 可以在郵箱中提取產品。

Name: Store_Package_Receive_Immediately
Text_English: Prizes will be paid out immediately upon reaching the target level.
Text_Korean: 獎品將在達到目標水平後立即支付。

Name: Store_Bought_MailProduct
Text_English:
You have completed your purchase.
Items can be picked up in the mailbox.
Text_Korean:
您已完成購買。
可以在郵箱中提取物品。

Name: Store_PackageMission_Hour
Text_Korean: 剩餘時間：{0} 小時 {1} 分鐘

Name: Store_MagicStore_Banner
Text_English: Mysterious magic shop that changes every day!
Text_Korean: 每天都在變化的神秘魔法商店！

Name: Store_MagicStore_RefreshDesc
Text_English: Would you like to renew your product?

Name: Store_MagicStore_EndTime
Text_English:
The time to purchase the product has passed.
Please check the updated list of new products.
Text_Korean:
購買產品的時間已經過去。
請查看更新的新產品列表。

Name: Store_MagicStore_EndRefresh
Text_English: We have exhausted the number of instant renewals available today.
Text_Korean: 我們已經用盡了今天可用的即時續訂數量。

Name: Store_MagicStore_RefreshInit
Text_English: The product list and the number of instant updates have been initialized.
Text_Korean: 產品列表和即時更新數量已初始化。

Name: Store_Costume_Guide
Text_English: Purchased items are paid out immediately and can be equipped in your wardrobe.
Text_Korean: 購買的物品會立即付款，並且可以裝備在您的衣櫥中。

Name: Store_Bought_ClosetProduct
Text_English:
The purchase has been completed.
The product is delivered to the costume wardrobe.
Text_Korean:
購買已完成。
產品已送到服裝衣櫃。

Name: Store_PackageBuyDescription
Text_English: - Purchased items are paid immediately and can be equipped in the costume menu.
Text_Korean: - 購買的物品立即付款，可以裝備在服裝菜單中。
